channel.title: Delta server editing pleas help
channel.description:
i have a delta 317 and i want to know how i can change the name of a teleport and make tabs for it and change it
For example the teleport says Bosses and a tab is like KBD God wars ect.
Also i want to know how to make pk points like when i playre kills someone in my server they gain some pk points and it keeps track somehwere so they can buy stuff from a shop...

item.title: Delta server editing pleas help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. ClickingMost.java

  2. Create a new token and then go to your death method and add

killerz.(tokenname) += #;
killerz.sM("You got pk points);

(tokenname) = your token name

= amount of pk points

Read full topic
